Text: Leave a comment if you download it and like it.
Downloading now! Can't say anything about the content since I will be getting my iPad in 2 weeks from now.
Thanx, some minor errors but thanx for the effort. The enclosed books are worth rereading..

Thanks for the torrent, mth978. But I only wanted one of these. I've read the others in paper form. If you can, next time, please don't zip them all together. That way we can pick and choose which files to download.

Cheers :-)
Works great on ipad with Ibook, thanks for the upload
Reading an epub on an iPad is like being a virgin.  You might enjoy it but you don't know what you're missing.  Go get a real ebook reader you silly Macheads.
@darkpoet1978: ePubs are the most common file format for all ebook readers, not just ipads. Don't be a smart-ass.
i havent downloaded it and I already like it.

Let me re-phrase that: Apple sucks.

Now go get a real eInk eBook reader.  Save some power and save your eyesight at the same time.
epubs rocks in my reader.....thumps down for apple ass
good set of books...i just checked lost symbol and formatting looks fine...thanks
